name: Coyote Flight Centers
about: Coyote Flight Centers, located at Rick Husband International Airport in Amarillo, Texas, is a comprehensive flight training facility. We offer Part 61 flight training, aircraft rental, and a pilot shop. Our services include FAA knowledge tests, sightseeing tours, BFR/IPC, free pilot resources, aerial photography, and a fully licensed FAA-approved flight simulator. Our instructors are dedicated to providing safe and confident training, with many students earning their first certificate in 40-50 hours. We emphasize proper training and preparation, ensuring students are well-equipped for their aviation careers. At Coyote Flight Centers, we are committed to being the guardians of aviation, ensuring every student is properly prepared before taking to the skies.
